events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team is reviewing it thoroughly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience in software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be guiding you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening call to better understand your background and technical skills in software and development.
Thank you for your prompt response after the screening call; we appreciate your enthusiasm and collaboration.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 18th, where you will discuss your software engineering capabilities with our senior developers.
The technical interview was successfully completed and feedback from the interviewers was very encouraging regarding your skills and experience.
An HR interview has been scheduled for April 22nd to discuss your fit within the company culture and benefits.
You successfully completed the HR interview; the HR team appreciated your professional attitude and clear communication.
We are pleased to propose you an official job offer for the Software Engineer position with a competitive salary and great benefits.
We received your affirmative feedback regarding the offer and are thrilled about your interest to join our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we look forward to welcoming you aboard as a valued software engineer.
Your onboarding process has started with us, including introductions, training schedules, and access setup to begin your role.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and you have joined the engineering team as a Software Engineer.
